Instance.description: Pass Organization Event information to the organization service.

Tunable.name: fake_duration
Tunable.description: The amount of time in Sim minutes that is used by UI to display the drama node's activity's duration. When the event actually runs the open street director determines actual end-time.

Tunable.name: location
Tunable.description: The string used to populate UI's location field in the organization events panel.

Tunable.name: organization
Tunable.description: The organization for which this drama node is scheduling venue events.
